docs.abstract: Mexican club Puebla says it will not release its two American defenders, DaMarcus Beasley and Michael Orozco, to join the United States national team for an exhibition game against Mexico; decision does not sit well with United States coach Jurgen Klinsmann.

docs.snippet: A players’ union would help. But several lawsuits could bring about even bigger changes....

docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column welcomes decision allowing Northwestern football team to form a players' union but holds college athletes still remain years away from gaining employee status that is their due; cites two ongoing class-action lawsuits that stand a far greater chance of changing the status quo in the NCAA.

headline.main: A Step Toward Justice in College Sports?
